Class DisplayPanel

java.lang.Object
  DisplayPanel

public class DisplayPanel
extends java.lang.Object

This class deals with objects on the display panel in which constantly changes depending on the state of the ATMClientProtocol class, in which is a parameter passed into this class which this class refers to. Objects on the panel are messages to the user, allowing the user to make withdrawels, check their balance, deposit cash and change pin number

Author:
Jamie Brindle (06352322)
